45.eng-name: The Book of Oaths (qasamah), Retaliation and Blood Money

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Al- Qasim bin Rabi'ah that the Messenger jof Allah said:"The accident that resembles on purpose, meaning (killing) with a stick or a whip, (for which the Diyah is) one hundred camels, of which forty should be (pregnant she-camels), with their young in their wombs

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى خَالِدٍ الْحَذَّاءِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning The Differences Reported From Khalid Al-Hadha
